channel.title: Pausing events

item.title: Pausing events
item.dc:creator: @razorback razorback
item.description:
@razorback wrote:

Hey guys, I was just wondering how to pause or delay certain events. I know there are methods within the Java library that do this, but this will pause the whole server for x amount of seconds.

It doesn’t necessarily have to be a certain amount of seconds, I just need a delay.

For example if I had:

public void sendMessages() {
sendMessage(“All”);
sendMessage(“Help”);
sendMessage(“Is”);
sendMessage(“Appreciated”);
}

Between each message I would want a delay, rather than it all at once.

All help is appreciated, thank you.

Read full topic
